analysis.description:
ICOBIDToken.annualInterest (/unique_contracts/0x4a2c5a2c189fa9a9d69f7ae4265a4c83224fd15d.sol#242-253) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1

ICOBIDToken.annualInterest (/unique_contracts/0x4a2c5a2c189fa9a9d69f7ae4265a4c83224fd15d.sol#242-253) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1
ICOBIDToken.getProofOfStakeReward (/unique_contracts/0x4a2c5a2c189fa9a9d69f7ae4265a4c83224fd15d.sol#253-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1
